title: Metal Gear Solid (PS1)
description: Metal Gear Solid is a Action-Adventure/Stealth video game published by Konami released on February 26th, 1999 for the Sony PlayStation.

title: Luigi's Mansion (Game Cube)
description: Luigi's Mansion is a Action-Adventure video game published by Nintendo released on May 3rd, 2002 for the Gamecube.

title: Dino Crisis (PS1)
description: Dino Crisis is a Survival Horror video game published by Capcom released on October 29th, 1999 for the Sony PlayStation.

title: Persona 2: Eternal Punishment (PS1)
description: Persona 2: Eternal Punishment is a RPG video game published by Atlus released on June 24th, 1999 for the Sony PlayStation.
